I'm revamping my blog

Oct 23, 2018

Just a little notice. I’m currently revamping my blog so it can be saves and runs on a static system. It will be ideal to make sure traffic doesn’t become an issue, ever. And free hosting via Github Pages.

Jekyll is a bit of a learning curve, but I’m making progress. It should be back to normal soon. With a new look. I kept my most popular post to date here so it should remain accessable.
